author: CBS News
title: How to grocery shop safely during the coronavirus pandemic
description: With stay-at-home orders in place for most of the country, many Americans find themselves running out of essential supplies like groceries. Consumer Reports senior editor Tobie Stanger joined CBSN with tips on how to stay safe while grocery shopping.
